job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: ulliKnowledge of AWS Infrastructure including S3 SNS Ec2 CloudWatch and RDSliliMin 1 years of experience on Matillion ELT tool and Snowflake DatabaseliliMin 5 years of experience with ETLData Transformation and one or more related products such as Informatica and SSISliliMin 4 years work experience in business intelligence data warehousing and logicalphysical model design requiredliliAdvanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases query authoring SQL as well as working familiarity with a variety of databasesliliExperience in building AWS Data Pipelines using PythonScala Apache Spark SparkSQL S3 Data Lake Snowflake RedshiftliliGood to have  Experience with any of the NoSQL datastores such as Elasticsearch MongoDB DynamoDB Cassandraliulpbrp
